A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a fan of Star Wars for over 20 years. This movie wrecked the entire idea of what Star Wars is. Iconic leads in the story aretotally out of character. Misplaced \"jokes\"\, unfinished storylines\, non sensical character deaths. This movie not only told a poor continuation but it disrespected everything presented in the originals and destroyed the storyline from the force awakens. I will never recommend or watch this movie again. Life long fans will be severely disappointed.
